title: Delhi's peak power demand grew 3.8x on hot and humid days in last 12 months: Report
description: Delhi's peak electricity demand surged due to temperature variations, with peak demand increasing by 711 MW on hot and humid days, 506 MW on cold days, and 188 MW on moderate days. The analysis by IEEFA highlighted the necessity of enhancing utility-scale solar power to meet rising demands and mitigate the impact of heatwaves.
